title: HubSpot CRM & Lead Magnet Funnel Setup (Tech VA)
job_overview:
I’m looking for a detail-oriented and tech-savvy virtual assistant to help set up a simple CRM and email capture funnel using HubSpot Free CRM.

This is a setup-focused role. If you do a great job, there’s potential for ongoing VA work and system management.

Responsibilities:

Set up a basic sales pipeline in HubSpot (cold lead > warm lead > call booked > client)

Create a landing page and email form to deliver a free guide (PDF)

Set up the email autoresponder to send the guide

Ensure all leads are correctly stored in HubSpot and can be tracked clearly

Test the entire funnel to make sure it works smoothly

Requirements:

Experience with HubSpot CRM (especially the free version)

Basic knowledge of landing page creation and email automation

Able to follow clear instructions and communicate well in English

Reliable, efficient, and able to deliver within the agreed timeframe

Bonus if you’ve worked with coaching or fitness businesses
